description: Triangle read by rows, 0 <= k < n, n >= 2: T(n,k) is the eventual period of the modified Fibonacci sequence x(j) (or 0 if x(j) never enters a cycle) defined as follows: x(0) = 0, x(1) = 1, and for j > 1 x(j) is obtained from x(j-1) + x(j-2) by deleting all occurrences of the digit k in base n.
